content: preventing gaps and should be worked once do not repeat them in subsequent rounds see video tutorial correcting gaps in socks on page 2 set-up round continue with n2 pick up and knit 15 17 19 21 sts from slipped sts on the edge of the heel flap there are 32 36 40 44 sts on n2 pick up and knit 1 extra st this is for closing the gap between the gusset and the rest of the sock continue patt as established on n1 pm pick up and knit 1 extra st this is for closing the gap between the gusset and the rest of the sock pick up and knit 15 17 19 21 sts from slipped sts on the edge of the heel flap there are 42 48 54 60 sts on n1 round 1 n2 k to end if you have picked up 1 extra st k2tog the last 2 sts n1 work patt as established to m sm if you have picked up 1 extra st ssk the first 2 sts k to end n2 k to 3 sts before end k2tog k1 1 st decrease d round 2 n1 work patt as established to m sm k1 ssk k to end 1 st decrease d n2 k to end round 3 n1 work patt as established to m sm k to end repeat rnds 1-3 for 9 10 11 12 more times for narrower gusset repeat rnds 2-3 for 9 10 11 12 more times there are 22 25 28 31 sts on n2 32 37 42 47 sts on n1 when reaching the m on n1 on the last repeat of round 3 move the 5 6 7 8 sts after m from n1 to n2 remove m there are 27 31 35 39 sts on n1 and n2 each foot round 1 n2 k to end n1 work patt as established repeat round 1 until desired foot length note try it on if you can the foot should reach your pinky toe or subtract about 4 cm from the measurement taken from back of heel to end of toe for your desired foot length stop after finishing a woven ribbing pattern round 4 on n1 and knit all sts on n2 crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 7 toe set-up rnds k for 3 rnds round 1 n1 & n2 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end k2tog k1 4 sts decrease d round 2 k all sts repeat rnds 1-2 for 6 5 4 4 more times then round 1 for 1 4 6 7 times there are 11 11 13 15 sts on each needle 22 22 26 30 sts in total break the yarn leaving an approx 40 cm / 16 tail graft toe sts together using kitchener stitch finish weave in ends
